DescriptionBox.Value: Look in the Plugins folder to see an example of the type of plugins you can load here

CloseAppsCB.Value: Close App and Wow on Stop

DonateLBL.Value: If you really enjoy my programs and want to encourage me to continue working on them, consider donating

Item.Translation: No New Revisions Available
Current Revision
Latest Revision
The developer suggests you don't run the bot at this time. This could be a safety reason or the bot needs to be updated. Read the news above or check the forums.
Sorry. There was an unhandled error that has occurred. Please send the log file to the developer or screen shot the next messagebox.
A WoW process was not found. Would you like to add all processes to the list? (Selecting a wrong process or 64-bit WoW will cause bad things to happen)
Attached to
Please select a Wow window to attach to.
Engine is already running.
You can't "Loot only items on left" and "Don't loot items on left" at the same time. Adjust these settings
Please select a minimum quality threshold for looting in the settings tab
Please enter a valid stop time in minutes
Could not connect to SVN. Sourceforge is down? or internet is spotty? Killing bot because we don't know if it is safe to bot.
A new version is available for download. Would you like to download it now??
New Version
There is a new revision of Coolfish on the SVN Repo, but no new release yet. Expect one soon.
Engine Running
Engine not running
Engine Stopped
It appears that a hook has already been applied. Coolfish can attempt to run along side this program but it may not work. (This will likely crash WoW if it doesn't) Do you want to attach anyway?
Looks like either another program is hooked, or Coolfish crashed and didn't clean up after itself. We can't attach until WoW is restarted. Please do so and reattach to the new process
